item.title: Soft Landing in A New Job
item.description: The first thing I found out in 2019 was that starting a new job as a senior developer was surprisingly difficult. The interview process is one thing, but when your first day finally arrives and you march in wearing your senior developer hat, that’s when it’s time to put your money where your mouth is.
